title: How to Stop Suffering
itunes:title: How to Stop Suffering
description:
Episode 631 - Pain is inevitable, suffering is optional. In this episode, I will teach you where your suffering comes from and how to get rid of it by being intention with where you focus your thoughts. Follow me on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
